welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Niagara-on-the-Lake, where charming streets, stunning vineyards, and the beautiful Niagara River await you. We invite you to immerse yourself in our city's unique charm and explore all that it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Catharines Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Niagara Falls International Airport is a modern and efficient facility, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The General Aviation Terminal at Niagara Falls International Airport provides services for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buffalo Niagara International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Buffalo Niagara International Airport serves regional and commuter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Billy Bishop Executive Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and executive flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
